channel.title: Comments for page "The RNG"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The RNG"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The reason why I stated that is because I had several other good sources informing me that it wasn't required to summon phases- And they were technically correct. We had a simple Chaos Gate and didn't pick up the R00t Access until much later, and we were still able to fight and defeat phases.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The upgrade does exist, it probably allows the phasing of kaijus…?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I don't get it… R00t access is the name of a village upgrade, what's the issue? Do you mean that you believe that you don't get the upgrade through defeating The RNG?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
"Village Upgrade * R00t Access - May summon Phases"

I'm going to assume that's incorrect, unless someone could be so kind as to test out the truth of the claim that it actually allows R00t Access as a -village- upgrade, thank you.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: while being true, you can get Lycoris through Beautiful Passed Over Touchstone with 4 Lost Weapons.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Shouldn't it be noted here too that the Lycoris is a Kaiju-only drop? If so, somebody please edit the page.
